bio.p: Fatemeh Abdi is a Postdoctoral fellowship in the University Health Network at the University of Toronto. She earned her Ph.D. in Biochemistry in 2018 from North Tehran Branch, Azad University. Then, Fatemeh joined the Azad University of QAZVIN as a lecturer. Her research focused on drug design, discovery, and computational biology. She is a consultant for chemical and pharmaceutical companies in Iran. She also was a QC manager of Toli Pers Co.
